summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3248, for the improvement of the alley in block 1, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between 14th Avenue Northeast and 15th Avenue Northeast, from East 43rd Street to East 45th Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40264 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
